attributes.action: africa to have easy access to the uk
attributes.additional_details: African countries find it extremely impossible for visiting the UK an costs so much money to gain a visa even then there's no guarantee an African will be accepted its time to change how visas are processed and visit visas are only valid for 6 months when an African is accepted to the UK 1 year should be the maximum time to have a stay in the UK let's have a more relaxed control on Africans who do want to visit the UK very few get accepted its time for a change and the time is now
